Name: Bloodless
Description: This card cannot be sacrificed.

Name: Boneless
Description: This card does not drop bones when dying.

Name: Sturdy
Description: This card cannot be hammered.

Name: Material Diet
Description: Bloodless cards can be sacrificed to this card.

Name: Spine Ripper Trait
Description: For each card in your discard with [mark:brittle] Brittle, you may play this card for 1 less bone.

Name: Diamond Cost
Description: This card's cost must be paid with different colored gems.

Name: Smoke Trait
Description: You may take 1 direct damage to play this card for free.

Name: Warren Trait
Description: When sacrificed, [sigil:RabbitHole] Rabbit Hole triggers.

Name: Nine Lives
Description: After sacrificing this card 9 times, it turns into an "Undead Cat".

Name: Amalgam Trait
Description: This card counts as every possible tribe.

Name: Freak Trait
Description: After spending 9 energy on this card, it turns into a "Mutant".

Name: Elder Brain Trait
Description: While this card is on the field, Ceremorph cards you control gain [mark:psionicpower] Psionic Guidance, itself included.

Name: Wendigo Trait
Description: This card can only be played using [sigil:CorpseEater] Corpse Eater.

Name: Mrs Bomb Trait
Description: This card ignores [sigil:Detonator] Detonator.

Name: Quickdraw Trait
Description: When played, this card will immediately attack, instead of attacking during your battle step.

Name: Goranj Trait
Description: If this card perishes due to [sigil:GemDependent] Gem Dependent, it strikes the opposing space before perishing.

Name: Paladin Trait
Description: If you control another Knight card, [sigil:Repulsive] also triggers.

Name: Sumberger Trait
Description: Adjacent cards have [sigil:Waterborne] Waterborne.

Name: Factory Trait
Description: When this card moves, roll a chemical. If it becomes Flesh, this card leaves a "Greater Homunculus" instead.

Name: Angler Trait
Description: This card's [sigil:Snag] Snag can move to the opposing space.

Name: Split Evolution
Description: When [sigil:Fledgling] Fledgling triggers, a coin is flipped. If heads, this card turns into a "TOKEN" instead.

Name: Chrome Trait
Description: This card cannot transform into its prism form.

Name: Flesh Trait
Description: Chemicals gained by this card are set to Flesh.

Name: Metal Trait
Description: Chemicals gained by this card are set to Metal.

Name: Elixir Trait
Description: Chemicals gained by this card are set to Elixir.

Name: Flesh Reroll Trait
Description: Flesh chemicals gained from this card are destroyed.

Name: Infected Mind Trait
Description: Only 1 sigil may be active on this card at a time.

Name: Homortulus Trait
Description: When killed in combat, a "Homunculus" is placed in adjacent spaces.

Name: Windswept Trait
Description: This card is pushed by any moving sigil.

Name: Golem Trait
Description: If you control the three Mox Golems, this card is free.

Name: EX Trait
Description: This card's [sigil:Divination] Divination sigil only triggers when it dies.

Name: Sarcophagus Trait
Description: The "Mummy Lord" this card turns into loses [sigil:Purist] Purist.

Name: Shadow Trait
Description: This trait is also transferred by [sigil:Haunter] Haunter.

Name: Make-a-Bot 1
Description: You probably think what I do is easy. Fiddle with the numbers, tweak the graphics... And voila! Botopia is made. No. You're wrong. Try making this card. Go ahead.

Name: Make-a-Bot 2
Description: But first, pick one to recycle.

Name: Panda Trait
Description: This card cannot target itself with its sigils.

Name: Weasel Trait
Description: [sigil:Opportunist] Opportunist also triggers when this card moves.

Name: Bionic Trait
Description: This card doesn't take damage from sigils.

Name: Securitron Trait
Description: [sigil:Spotlight] Spotlight also affects diagonal spaces.

Name: Swap Latch Trait
Description: The [sigil:Swapper] Swapper sigil only triggers when latched.

Name: Obol Trait
Description: If you play its other half next to it, they may join again.

Name: Hell Trait
Description: You may sacrifice more cards than needed, each extra sacrifice will make this card gain 1 power and 2 health.

Name: Gr1zz trait
Description: When played, this card changes form.
